name: UBER: Cash generation + reasonable valuation outweighs headline risk
description: Uber can keep growing while converting revenue into free cash flow, and the stock is not overpriced versus that cash. Risks (insurance/regulatory/labor) are real but not escalating.

claims.statement: Revenue is still growing at a healthy pace
Free cash flow margin is solid
Recent news shock is not severe (not a headline crisis)
Valuation is not expensive versus cash (FCF yield is decent)
Insurance risk is not spiking recently
